org.gvsig.tools.swing.impl.icontheme

Class BaseIconTheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.tools.swing.impl.icontheme.BaseIconTheme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IconTheme
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FolderIconTheme, IconThemeZip

    public class BaseIconTheme
extends Object
implements IconTheme

    This class represents an icon theme, which is basically a mapping of symbolic icon names, and real icons (or icon paths). This is useful to change an application's icons in an easy way. An icon theme is usually read from disk on start up, but can also be created or modified on a later time.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.gvsig.tools.swing.icontheme.IconTheme

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription(String description)
        Description copied from interface: IconTheme
        Sets the theme description. It should be a short description (around 20-30 words), including the highlights of the theme, the author and maybe its email address or a link the the theme's homepage.
        Specified by:
        setDescription in interface IconTheme
